talked.text: You're back. Do you need anything else?

choices.text: I don't need anything. See you later.

askClass.text: That's my classroom too. It's in the second floor. Go upstairs on your right once you get inside the building. And in the first floor is the principal's office.

alreadyIntroduced.text: You've already told me your name.

choices.text: No. I'm sorry, I'm in a hurry. Bye.

introduce.text: Nice to meet ya, I'm Alison.
I hope you have a nice time here. People are really nice.

afterPlayerIntroduction.text: I'll see you in class then.
The boy with the yellow shirt next to the playground entrance is also in our class.
He's very nice. Why don't you go and talk to him?

goodbye.text: Don't be shy, I don't bite.
Well, see ya. Have a nice first day.

root.text: Are you new? I haven't seen you around here before.

choices.text: Excuse me, I'm in a hurry (You leave).

guilleGoodbye.text: We should get inside. See ya.
